overview: Hardcore Nullarbor Posties 28 Riders take on the barren plains of the Nullarbor on Honda CT 110 postie bikes to raise funds for the Royal Flying Doctor Service in an adventure that`s tougher than tin underpants.  The Carnarvon Ranges of Central Queensland Phil Hodgens, Mark Woolly and Marc Smith take on the bike swallowing bulldust holes of the Carnarvon Ranges on a pair of Suzuki DR 650s and a KTM 625 in an adventure thats madder than Mad Cow`s Manure.  Three State Desert Blast Phil and Bill take on the deserts of South Australia at the Height of summer on a KTM 950 and a DR 650 in an adventure that`s hotter than Satan`s Jaffle Iron.  The Granite Belt Phil, Markymark and Aqua reveal their Hotness on an XT 600, a DR 650 and a KTM 525 as they ride the Granite Belt of the Queensland/New South Wales Border in an Adventure that`s sure to raise a few eyebrows.  Tyre Tips Safari Legend Craig Hartley from Dalby Moto shares some trail side tips on how to change flat tyres.
title: Motorbikin': Tales From the Saddle
